member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA
member.summary: Holds custom folder settings. This structure is used with the function.

member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA.dwSize
member.summary: The size of the structure, in bytes.

summary.para: A DWORD value specifying which folder attributes to read or write from this structure. Use one or more of the following values to indicate which structure members are valid:
Deprecated. pvid contains the folder's GUID.
Deprecated. pszWebViewTemplate contains a pointer to a buffer containing the path to the folder's WebView template.
pszInfoTip contains a pointer to a buffer containing the folder's info tip.
pszIconFile contains the path to the file containing the folder's icon.
pszLogo contains the path to the file containing the folder's thumbnail icon.

member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA.pszWebViewTemplate
member.summary: A pointer to a null-terminated string containing the path to the folder's WebView template.

member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA.cchWebViewTemplate
member.summary: If the parameter dwReadWrite is FCS_READ, this is the size of the pszWebViewTemplate buffer, in characters. If not, this is the number of characters to write from that buffer. Set this parameter to 0 to write the entire string.

member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA.pszWebViewTemplateVersion
member.summary: A pointer to a null-terminated buffer containing the WebView template version.

member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA.pszInfoTip
member.summary: A pointer to a null-terminated buffer containing the text of the folder's infotip.

member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA.cchInfoTip
member.summary: If the parameter dwReadWrite is FCS_READ, this is the size of the pszInfoTip buffer, in characters. If not, this is the number of characters to write from that buffer. Set this parameter to 0 to write the entire string.

member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA.pclsid
member.summary: A pointer to a CLSID used to identify the folder in the Windows registry. Further folder information is stored in the registry under that CLSID entry.

member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA.pszIconFile
member.summary: A pointer to a null-terminated buffer containing the path to file containing the folder's icon.

member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA.cchIconFile
member.summary: If the parameter dwReadWrite is FCS_READ, this is the size of the pszIconFile buffer, in characters. If not, this is the number of characters to write from that buffer. Set this parameter to 0 to write the entire string.

member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA.iIconIndex
member.summary: The index of the icon within the file named in pszIconFile.

member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA.pszLogo
member.summary: A pointer to a null-terminated buffer containing the path to the file containing the folder's logo image. This is the image used in thumbnail views.

member.name: SHFOLDERCUSTOMSETTINGSA.cchLogo
member.summary: If the parameter dwReadWrite is FCS_READ, this is the size of the pszLogo buffer, in characters. If not, this is the number of characters to write from that buffer. Set this parameter to 0 to write the entire string.
